name: Ekam Foundation
briefDescription: Ekam Foundation is a Non Governmental Organization which is working for the healthcare of underprivileged children in Tamilnadu since 2007 and recently launched our projects in Maharastra , Chattisgarh & Uttrakhand India.We admit poor children in private hospitals with whom we have networked and reimburse the subsidies given by them. We bring in support for the hospitalization (secondary & tertiary care) of the children admitted in private hospitals and renting ventilators, lab support & medicines for the children of  Government Hospitals. Children by definition for us is  below 19yrs.Ekam was formally inaugurated on Doctorâ€™s day July 1st 2007 as a Community Pediatric Project of CIOSA( Confederation of  Indian Organizations for service and Advocacy) which is the CSR initiative of Mafoi Foundation .We are also happy to inform you that Ekam changed into a Public private partnership model by joining hands with the government health department on 14th Nov, 2008. Ekam Foundation spun off as separate organization in August 2009.
